text: Thomas James "Jake" McCoy (January 2, 1942 â€“ February 5, 2021) was an American Olympic ice hockey defenseman. He was born in Minneapolis, Minnesota. McCoy played with Team USA at the 1964 Winter Olympics held in Innsbruck, Austria. He later played one year for the Minnesota Nationals in the United States Hockey League. McCoy died on February 5, 2021 in Minneapolis, aged 79. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Minneapolis Category:American ice hockey defensemen Category:Olympians for the United States
title: Jake McCoy
